ValidationRule.description: Water Efficiency - Indoor Water Use Reduction - Point Check
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 0 || LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 1 || LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 2 || LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 3 || LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 4 || LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 5 || LEED_USR_Mod_WE_2__c = 6 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field's value is outside of the acceptable range. Please adjust to a value of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6.
